tidbits.title: Cultural Treasures
tidbits.description: Belgium is home to stunning medieval towns like Bruges, renowned for its well-preserved architecture and historic charm, attracting tourists worldwide.

tidbits.title: Culinary Delights
tidbits.description: Belgium is famous for its culinary offerings, including waffles, chocolates, and a vast array of delicious beers, showcasing its gastronomic excellence.

tidbits.title: European Union Headquarters
tidbits.description: Brussels, Belgium's capital, houses the headquarters of the European Union, playing a pivotal role in global politics and diplomacy.
